create table activity_logs (
        created_at timestamp(6),
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        project_id bigint,
        target_id bigint,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        user_id bigint,
        ip_address varchar(255),
        action_type enum ('APPROVE','CREATE','DELETE','DOWNLOAD','LOGIN','LOGOUT','REJECT','REMOVE','SUBMIT','UPDATE','UPLOAD'),
        target_table enum ('ATTACHMENT','CHECKLIST','CHECKLIST_OPTION','CHECKLIST_QUESTION','COMMENT','COMPANY','POST','POST_ANSWER','PROJECT','PROJECT_MEMBER','STEP','STEP_REQUEST','STEP_RESPONSE','TEMPLATE','USER'),
        primary key (id)
    )

create table attachments (
        created_at timestamp(6),
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        file_size bigint,
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        target_id bigint,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        content_type varchar(100),
        file_path varchar(500),
        url varchar(1000),
        file_name varchar(255),
        attachment_type enum ('FILE','LINK') not null,
        target_type enum ('POST','POST_COMMENT','PROJECT_CONTRACT','STEP_REQUEST','STEP_REQUEST_ANSWER','SUPPORT','SUPPORT_COMMENT') not null,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table checklist_answers (
        answered_at timestamp(6) not null,
        answered_by bigint not null,
        checklist_id bigint not null,
        created_at timestamp(6),
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        question_id bigint not null,
        selected_option_id bigint,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        answer_text TEXT,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table checklist_options (
        has_input boolean not null,
        order_index integer not null,
        created_at timestamp(6),
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        question_id bigint not null,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        option_text varchar(255) not null,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table checklist_questions (
        order_index integer not null,
        checklist_id bigint not null,
        created_at timestamp(6),
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        question_text TEXT not null,
        question_type enum ('MULTI','SINGLE','TEXT') not null,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table checklists (
        is_deleted boolean not null,
        is_locked boolean not null,
        is_template boolean not null,
        created_at timestamp(6),
        created_by bigint not null,
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        step_id bigint,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        category varchar(50),
        description TEXT,
        title varchar(255) not null,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table comment_histories (
        version integer not null,
        comment_id bigint not null,
        created_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        updated_by bigint not null,
        content TEXT not null,
        primary key (id),
        unique (comment_id, version)
    )

create table comments (
        created_at timestamp(6),
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        parent_comment_id bigint,
        post_id bigint not null,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        user_id bigint not null,
        content TEXT not null,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table companies (
        created_at timestamp(6),
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        address varchar(255),
        business_number varchar(255) unique,
        email varchar(255) unique,
        memo varchar(255),
        name varchar(255) not null,
        representative varchar(255),
        company_type enum ('AGENCY','CLIENT'),
        status enum ('ACTIVE','INACTIVE') not null,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table faq (
        order_index integer not null,
        created_at timestamp(6),
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        answer TEXT,
        question varchar(255) not null,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table help_articles (
        created_at timestamp(6),
        created_by bigint not null,
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        content TEXT,
        title varchar(255) not null,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table notifications (
        is_read boolean not null,
        created_at timestamp(6),
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        read_at timestamp(6),
        related_post_id bigint,
        related_project_id bigint,
        related_step_request_id bigint,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        user_id bigint not null,
        message TEXT,
        title varchar(255) not null,
        priority enum ('IMPORTANT','NORMAL') not null,
        type enum ('APPROVAL_APPROVED','APPROVAL_REJECTED','APPROVAL_REQUEST','CHECKLIST_CREATED','CHECKLIST_SUBMITTED','MENTION','NEW_COMMENT','NEW_POST','PROJECT_COMPLETED','PROJECT_CREATED','PROJECT_DELETED','PROJECT_INFO_UPDATED','PROJECT_MEMBER_ADDED','PROJECT_MEMBER_REMOVED','PROJECT_MEMBER_ROLE_UPDATED','PROJECT_STATUS_CHANGED','PROJECT_UPDATED','STEP_DECISION','STEP_REQUEST','SYSTEM_NOTICE','TASK_ASSIGNED','TASK_COMPLETED') not null,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table post_answers (
        answered_by bigint,
        created_at timestamp(6),
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        question_id bigint,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        content TEXT,
        answer_type enum ('ETC','NO','YES'),
        primary key (id)
    )

create table post_history (
        version integer not null,
        created_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        post_id bigint not null,
        updated_by bigint not null,
        attachments JSON,
        content TEXT,
        title varchar(255) not null,
        primary key (id),
        unique (post_id, version)
    )

create table post_question_options (
        has_input boolean not null,
        created_at timestamp(6),
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        question_id bigint not null,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        option_text TEXT not null,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table post_questions (
        created_at timestamp(6),
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        post_id bigint,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        question_text TEXT not null,
        question_type enum ('MULTI','SINGLE','TEXT') not null,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table posts (
        project_phase tinyint check (project_phase between 0 and 3),
        created_at timestamp(6),
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        parent_post_id bigint,
        step_id bigint,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        user_id bigint,
        content TEXT not null,
        title varchar(255) not null,
        open_status enum ('CLOSED','OPEN') not null,
        status enum ('CONFIRMED','DELETED','NORMAL','REJECTED','WAITING_CONFIRM') not null,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table project_members (
        created_at timestamp(6),
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        project_id bigint,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        user_id bigint,
        role enum ('ADMIN','MEMBER') not null,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table projects (
        contract_price numeric(38,2),
        company_id bigint,
        created_at timestamp(6),
        created_by bigint not null,
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        end_date timestamp(6),
        expected_end_date timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        start_date timestamp(6),
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        contract_file_url varchar(255),
        description varchar(255),
        name varchar(255) not null,
        phase enum ('CONTRACT','DELIVERY','IN_PROGRESS','MAINTENANCE') not null,
        status enum ('CLOSED','OPEN') not null,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table step_request_answers (
        created_at timestamp(6),
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        responded_by bigint not null,
        step_request_id bigint not null,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        reason_text TEXT,
        response enum ('APPROVE','CHANGE_REQUEST','REJECT') not null,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table step_request_histories (
        created_at timestamp(6),
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        request_id bigint not null,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        updated_by bigint not null,
        field_name varchar(100),
        after_content TEXT,
        before_content TEXT,
        history_type enum ('FILE_UPDATE','REASON_UPDATE','REQUEST_UPDATE') not null,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table step_requests (
        created_at timestamp(6),
        decided_at timestamp(6),
        decided_by bigint,
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        requested_by bigint not null,
        step_id bigint not null,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        request_description TEXT,
        request_title varchar(255) not null,
        status enum ('APPROVED','CANCELED','CHANGE_REQUESTED','REJECTED','REQUESTED') not null,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table steps (
        order_index integer,
        created_at timestamp(6),
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        project_id bigint not null,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        user_id bigint,
        description varchar(255),
        title varchar(255) not null,
        phase enum ('CONTRACT','DELIVERY','IN_PROGRESS','MAINTENANCE') not null,
        status enum ('APPROVED','IN_PROGRESS','PENDING','WAITING_APPROVAL') not null,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table support_ticket_comments (
        created_at timestamp(6),
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        ticket_id bigint not null,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        user_id bigint not null,
        content TEXT not null,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table support_tickets (
        closed_at timestamp(6),
        created_at timestamp(6),
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        user_id bigint not null,
        content TEXT,
        title varchar(255) not null,
        status enum ('CLOSED','IN_PROGRESS','OPEN','RESOLVED') not null,
        primary key (id)
    )

create table users (
        is_temporary_password boolean,
        company_id bigint,
        created_at timestamp(6),
        deleted_at timestamp(6),
        id bigint generated by default as identity,
        last_login_at timestamp(6),
        updated_at timestamp(6),
        email varchar(255) not null unique,
        name varchar(255) not null,
        password varchar(255) not null,
        phone_number varchar(255),
        role enum ('AGENCY','CLIENT','SYSTEM_ADMIN') not null,
        status enum ('ACTIVE','DELETED','INVITED','SUSPENDED') not null,
        primary key (id)
    )
